algorithms.html: The "closepath" (Z or z) ends the current subpath by connecting it back to its initial point in either of two ways:

steps.html:
If the previous command is <q>complete</q>, that is that all the
    required coordinate data has been supplied, then an automatic
    straight line is drawn from the current point to the initial
    point of the current subpath. This path segment may be of zero
    length.

If the previous command is missing required coordinate data then
    the initial point is used to fill in the missing data (but only
    for the last point or points).
